Title: Episode #1.6
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Joe Penhall (teleplay by), Tobias Lindholm (teleplay by), Joe Penhall (story by)
Actors: Katherine Banks, Sonny Valicenti, Cotter Smith, Anna Torv
Plot: Wendy considers an offer. Holden and Bill struggle to communicate their findings to the judicial system in the baffling Altoona case.
